channel.title: ActivityPub References
channel.description:
(This is a wiki post that anyone can edit, by clicking the Edit button in bottom-right corner)
### Considerations
@aschrijver: This is already the 'ActivityPub' forum. Top-level categories may be 'Research', 'Specifications', 'Community'. For clients / servers / libraries we can link to the Feneas watchlists that record these.
### Collecting links
(add links to stuff here, that make likely menu item candidates, and you don't know where they fit best)
### Forum menu structure
#### Research
- [Spritely Project]() - [PUBLIC DREAM]() - (separator) - [CapTP]() - [ERIS]()
#### Implementation
- [AP Implementers Guide]() - (separator) - [AP Testsuite]() - [AP Unofficial Testsuite]() - [FediDB]() - (separator) - [AP Application watchlist]() - [AP Developer watchlist]() - [AP Clients watchlist]()
#### Specification
- [SocialCG Working Group]() - [Fediverse Enhancement Proposals]() - (separator) - [ActivityStreams Core]() - [ActivityStreams Vocab]() - [ActivityPub]() - [NodeInfo]() - [NodeInfo2]() - (separator) - [HTTP Signatures]() - [JSON-LD Signatures]() - [Webfinger]() - [OAuth2]() - [JSON-LD]()
#### Community
- [Fediverse Party]() - [Fedi Library]() - [Feneas Forum]()
